attributes.action: improve the standard of spelling in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Judging by the quality of English and the spelling used on this web-site alone, there is a clear need to improve the standards of English taught.

Schools should pick up on the quality of grammar and not provide marks simply because of the "intent".

With immigration reportedly due to rise by another 15m over the next 40 years, it is imperative that something is done now - uthawize weel looz thu beutE of our own Langwij.
